name: Pie, anyone?
description:
Battle it out to get the biggest pile of junk possible, then tried it in for a nice slice of pie! 

This game was originally created to be played with Nintendo Switch Joy-cons.

Please make sure you joy-cons are connected to your pc using Bluetooth before launching.

Each player can use one joy-con as a controller. Clicking the joystick can go throw the menus and pressing the triggers readys up the player. once there are more than two  controllers ready, the game will begin.

You move your character around using the accelerometer in the joy con. The camera can be moved using the joystick
